text: ohuṭa kiri dena men da, oba ohu kerehi biya vū viṭa ohuva gan̆gaṭa daman men da, tavada oba biya novanu tavada oba duk novanu yæyi da, niyata vaśayenma api oba veta ohu nævata labā dennan vemu emenma api ohu dharma dūtayin aturin keneku bavaṭa pat karannō vemu yæyi da api mūsāgē mavaṭa dēva paṇiviḍa danvā siṭiyemu
